reporting.reportgraph.GraphQuery:
SET @FromDate ={%DatabaseSchema%}.Func_Analytics_DateTrim(@FromDate,'{%if (Interval == null) { "year" } else { Interval }|(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)f3c748ddec6e60c55ee52c7d021c4961762b79df5190c12700c04f641f15c923%}');
SELECT {%if (Columns == null) { "Date" } else { Columns }|(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)51e412adbaa01355a8c74c507a6a612d3d6f80530c6ac17ed3f46b21520c2925%} AS StartTime , T1.Hits AS Time FROM {%DatabaseSchema%}.Func_Analytics_EnsureDates (@FromDate,@ToDate,'{%if (Interval == null) { "year" } else { Interval }|(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)f3c748ddec6e60c55ee52c7d021c4961762b79df5190c12700c04f641f15c923%}') AS Dates LEFT JOIN (SELECT HitsStartTime AS StartTime, SUM(HitsValue) / SUM(HitsCount) AS hits FROM Analytics_Statistics INNER JOIN {%if (AnalyticsTable == null) { "Analytics_YearHits" } else { AnalyticsTable }|(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)4a553e06dbcb4318b817da0cefd5b884aa6ca3634054fa94b8dc4ac8ace086d8%} ON {%if (AnalyticsTable == null) { "Analytics_YearHits" } else { AnalyticsTable }|(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)4a553e06dbcb4318b817da0cefd5b884aa6ca3634054fa94b8dc4ac8ace086d8%}.HitsStatisticsID = Analytics_Statistics.StatisticsID WHERE (StatisticsSiteID = @CMSContextCurrentSiteID) AND (StatisticsCode = 'avgtimeonpage') AND StatisticsObjectID = @NodeID AND StatisticsObjectCulture = @CultureCode GROUP BY HitsStartTime) AS T1 ON T1.StartTime = [Date]
